channel.title: Gilles on Plakar - Effortless backup
channel.description: Recent content in Gilles on Plakar - Effortless backup

item.title: Kloset: the immutable data store
item.description: Immutable, queryable, encrypted snapshots with context and integrity — Kloset redefines how data is stored, verified, and reused…

item.title: Plakar 1.0.1-beta.13 out !
item.description: New UI filters, timeline navigation, S3 and FTP support, checkpointing, and performance boosts in Plakar’s latest beta release…

item.title: Plakar beta.4 and upcoming features
item.description: New UI previews, performance boosts, SFTP fixes, CLI testing, packaging on BSDs—beta.4 refines Plakar while previewing what’s next…

item.title: Plakar beta release !
item.description: First public beta of Plakar is out: scalable, encrypted, efficient, and open-source backups ready for real-world testing and feedback…
